name: Blitz Fruit Block 1010
description:
Blitz Fruit Block 1010 is a free jigsaw puzzle totally. Simple but addictive puzzle game!
Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age. Simply Drag & Drop fruit blocks in order to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally, get scores to pass all puzzle levels.
FEATURES
• Simple play and easy control.
• Various fruit blocks and stunning graphic.
• Smooth and delicate animation.
• Funny sound effects.
• Hours of fun, exciting play.
